Title: Crime by Night
Writer: Richard Weil, Joel Malone, Daniel Mainwaring
Actors: Jane Wyman, Jerome Cowan, Faye Emerson
Plot: Detective Sam Campbell and his perky sidekick Robby Vance are called in on a routine child support dispute. Things take an unexpected turn when the client's ex-father-in-law, head of a chemical plant, is the victim of an axe murder.
